Description:
YOUR OWN PIECE OF PARADISE!
***CLOSING DATE FOR OFFERS WEDNESDAY JUNE 10TH 6PM (UNLESS SOLD PRIOR)***
Situated on a quiet street with one of your neighbours a farm, this land offers filtered views and the opportunity to build your dream home (subject to council approval) on this 1009m2 (1/4 acre block). If peace and quiet is what youre after and you want to escape the rat-race, here is the property for you.
The township of Cockatoo is located within an hours drive of Melbourne CBD and offers a great community. The location of this block offers access also to nearby Emerald within a 5 minute drive.
This property must be sold, so make sure you put your offer forward and dont miss out on this opportunity!
Please contract Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.
Vacant Land
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

We are all taking extra measures to protect our clients and staff from coming into contact with the virus. Please help us by respecting our request that you do not attend an Inspection or the office if you have:
- Tested positive to Coronavirus
- Symptoms associated with Coronavirus
- Recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
- Recently been overseas
- Agreed to any self-isolation conditions
We also ask that you practice social distancing from anyone attending the office or at an inspection, and where possible refrain from touching surfaces. We also appreciate your understanding as we are only able to have 10 people view the interior of the property at a time.
Thank you for your understanding

Description:
CALLING ALL FIRST HOME BUYERS AND INVESTORS
Perfectly located within walking distance of the town centre, this 3 bedroom home offers a great opportunity for you to get into the market. With big living area, two bathrooms, ducted heating and dual road access this is a great place to live and would also make an ideal investment. There is two road access, a double carport under roofline and a double garage at the rear all on a completely usable block of ¼ acre approx. that has lovely established gardens. The rear decked area offers a wonderful mountain view and is the perfect place to sit back and enjoy the hills lifestyle you deserve. Also on offer is the bonus of a 2 room workshop under the home. With our highly regarded Primary School and bus stop just a short distance away, everything you need is at your fingertips.

Description:
Renovate and Reap the Rewards!!
Perfectly located within walking distance to school, shops, public transport & everything the beautiful hills town of Cockatoo has to offer is this home that is ready for you to add your own touches to.
Sitting proudly on a ¼ acre that offers established gardens and plenty of parking. The home features 4 spacious bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen with adjoining meals area and an open plan spacious living room. All rooms have large windows allowing plenty of natural light to flow through.
All of this located in a quiet sealed court in a tightly held part of town.
Whether youre a first home buyer, investor or renovator this is a perfect property for you.

Description:
BEAUTIFULLY UPDATED IN THE HEART OF TOWN
Located in the heart of Cockatoo and only a stones throw to the main street, highly regarded Cockatoo Primary, public transport and the brand new IGA supermarket, is this beautifully updated home offering the turn key solution or instant investment youve been looking for.
Offering a well equipped kitchen with stainless steel cooking, dishwasher and cupboard space while over looking the light and bright lounge room with split system heating and cooling, the home provides the perfect opportunity for instant enjoyment. Boasting 3 bedrooms, 2 of which are complimented with built in robes and are all serviced by the updated central bathroom and separate toilet.
Outside provides a lovely covered verandah at the front of the home which overlooks the stunning and flat expansive lawn area perfect for the kids to play or your favourite four-legged friend to bound.
A flat block in the centre of town is a rare opportunity and one that is sure to be snapped up quick, so call today to secure your inspection!

Description:
Never seen before - 2 Flat Acres with a Solid 3 Bedroom Home & Shedding !!
This is an amazing opportunity to secure a solid, well insulated and comfortable brick home on 2 FLAT acres. This is the perfect property if youre looking for a small acreage to use, to share with your animals, pursue your hobby farm endeavours or simply enjoy the space and privacy. Located on a sealed road, this property includes a 3 bedroom brick home that is ready for you to place your personal touches on to make it your own. Featuring pitched ceilings, character wood panelled walls, ambient wood fire heater and a spacious kitchen, the home has all the bones for a stunning renovation yet is ready to move in and enjoy if you are happy with the simple things in life. There is a single carport attached to the home and the rear covered pergola provides the perfect place to sit and contemplate the joys of semi-rural life.
Conveniently there is double entry from Kirk Rd which would make for a great circular drive with easy access to the two 4 car garages with concrete floor and power available in one. Add to this 3 well fenced paddocks with electric standoff, perfect for horses, dogs or any animals you desire and the crystal clear, endless supply of bore water.
Situated only minutes drive from Cockatoo or Emerald, this is a rare opportunity to own small acreage conveniently close to everything without the huge price tag!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
YOUR ONE ACRE SANCTUARY (APPROX)
This perfectly presented home sits proudly on 4016m2 and offers the peace and privacy that you have been looking for. The home has been tastefully renovated with neutral tones and offers a floor plan designed around family lifestyle with the open plan living area located in the heart of the home adjoining the modern kitchen that has a contemporary colour scheme, plenty of storage including a large pantry, quality bench tops, two draw dishwasher, 2 ovens, breakfast bar and a beautiful view over the rear garden. The bedrooms have been zoned for privacy with the master complete with walk in robe located at the front of the home and the other 3 bedrooms located at the other end serviced by the family bathroom. Special features include timber look flooring, new paint throughout, modern bathroom that showcases a frameless shower and deep bath, updated laundry including large bench, split system heating and cooling, wood heater and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through the home. The property offers lovely established gardens that include stunning stone walls, veggie gardens and large lawn areas that will have you thinking that you are living in a park. Also on offer is a double tandem carport, workshop, wood shed, 2 x 10,000 water tanks for the garden, cleared space for a shed and much more. Call today inspection is a must!

Description:
BLISS ON 27 ACRES, MIXTURE OF CLEARED LAND AND BUSH WITH COTTAGES
GENUINE SELLERS
The Setting:
27 acres of natural bush and cleared pasture, beautiful vistas, abundant bird life, native flora and visiting fauna, kangaroos, wallabies, and echidnas. Peaceful, private and picturesque.
The Residence:
A ranch style home of grand proportions, 4 spacious bedrooms the main with full ensuite, WIR and sitting room. The remaining bedrooms are serviced by the family bathroom. The central hub of the home is open plan incorporating the large timber kitchen with an abundance of cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, a dining area and huge living zone. A second living space positioned at the opposite end of the house, with an adjoining office/study with separate entry, would be a fabulous pool/games/theatre room. A favourite place to relax on a balmy summers evening will be the wide shady verandah affording views over the picturesque land holding. In addition, there is an over height garage for the boat or caravan, a farm shed and double carport.
Two self- contained cottages provide flexibility. The extra-large cottages offer spa baths in glass bay windows, separate lounge, kitchen and dining areas, all fittings and fixtures are inclusive with the sale. Ideal for in-laws accomodation.
The Location:
In the stunning Yarra Valley surrounded by wineries, wedding venues, cafes and restaurants, Puffing Billy, walking trails, mountain bikes, horse riding and amazing scenery. A tourist mecca. Nearby is the highly regarded Cockatoo Primary School, Emerald Secondary College, alternative education and private school options.
We are looking forward to showing you this intriguing residence and cottages, so call Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522, Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
Space and Versatility For Family Living!
Situated high on a half acre block is this well presented 5 bedroom family home.
Step inside to a light filled living zone and a dedicated meals area. The contemporary kitchen complete with white cabinetry, ample bench space and large pantry seamlessly integrates with the main living area over a large breakfast bench where creating memorable meals and social mingling will be easy.
The second living area provides that much needed extra space a family will love, and leads to the Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite. The remaining 4 robed bedrooms are zoned away from the master and are serviced by the family bathroom. For added living convenience, there is an internal access to the large double carport. Gas ducted heating and air conditioning will ensure climate comfort for the family all year round.
A covered paved area, which has the flexibility to be utlised as a double carport, will be well used for entertaining outdoors and the large allotment gives plenty of space for kids and pets to play. The sealed driveway leads to another double carport and the massive six car garage at the rear of the property, complete with a concrete floor, power, water, wood fire heater and toilet, offers ample parking space for cars & trailers and the provision for a very impressive workshop set up.
This home offers so much space and versatility to adapt to family needs and is located conveniently close to Cockatoo and Emerald townships.
**CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!**
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS!
***PRIVATE INSPECTIONS CAN BE BOOKED FOR THIS PROPERTY***
Located on a no-through road just a short walk to the shops and bus, this property provides an ideal opportunity to get stuck in and make it your own. Featuring 3 bedrooms upstairs, central bathroom with open plan living and kitchen surrounded by a deck, there is also 3 rooms downstairs, plus lots of available space to utilize. The houses construction is concrete block with steel posts. The block is approximately ¼ acre with a sealed driveway and is fully fenced. Properties in this price range in Neighbourhood Residential Zone dont come along very often - so be quick! To organise your inspection call Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432.

Description:
NEAT & SWEET
Tucked away on a quiet road and just minutes to Cockatoo Town Centre, this private and renovated home is perfect for first home buyers, downsizers or even a great property to add to your investment portfolio.
The large front verandah welcomes you as you step inside to the spacious open plan living, kitchen and meals area with stunning cathedral ceilings, gas log fireplace, ceiling fan and split system air-conditioning to ensure year-round comfort. The modern style kitchen boasts stone bench tops, gas cooking and plenty of cupboard space.
The accommodation offers 3 spacious bedrooms with BIR's serviced by the large modern style family bathroom with walk-in shower, double vanity, bath, toilet and euro style laundry plus an additional powder room.
Boasting solar power, a spacious secure front yard with plenty of off-street parking & fully fenced 1,200 m2 (approx.) block with 2 garden sheds plus a workshop space and a great outdoor undercover pergola perfect for entertaining and watching over the little ones & furry friends in the rear yard.
Just a short walk to Cockatoo Primary School, Childcare Centre, a selection of shops, cafes, restaurants and bus connections to Belgrave with a trainline to the CBD and beyond..
Inspection By Appointment - Please contact our office.

Description:
Scandi design in bush idyll
Immerse yourself on over an acre of rainforest in this split-level delight of a fairy tale home. The living is open plan and the feeling is cosy enriched by small details and handmade touches everywhere. From little shelves and tiny high up cupboards to the hardwood floors, this home is full of warmth and a cohesive Scandinavian attitude.
The kitchen is a rustic triumph with handcrafted Merbau hardwood cupboard doors. The contemporary open shelving is up to the minute, as is the breakfast bar. It is completed with a sleek Smeg oven and gas stovetop. The adjacent meals area sits under a large sunny window overlooking the lovely courtyard.
Step down into the living space where a wall of windows invites you to soak up the forest view. This relaxing space is a joy in winter, centred around the wood-fired heater. In summer months you can turn on the split system or open it up to the veranda and while away the time, listening to birds and Cockatoo Creek burbling away. The regenerated native bush features a walking track through the ferns down to the creek where you can watch for wombats, echidnas, and wallabies.
The master bedroom looks out into the bushland and has rolling barn doors tucking away the walk-in wardrobe and ensuite. The second bedroom overlooks a gorgeous waratah and the third features a rolling french glass door. The monochrome and sage bathroom is a design masterclass.
If you are looking for a home with heart and a happy-ever-after get straight to the open for this one.
Insights: 37 Lisheen Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2020 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Calling first home buyers and down sizers!
**PLEASE CONTACT AGENT DIRECTLY TO BOOK YOUR PRIVATE VIEWING**
This beautifully styled 3 bedroom home, in one of Cockatoos most appealing locations has all the comforts you need. The elevated log cabin sits on an almost flat ¼ acre with covered decks on both the front and rear of the house where you can admire the gardens and wildlife, and enjoy your investment year round.
Inside, the open plan connects the spacious lounge and meals area to a good sized and workable kitchen that invites entertaining with friends and family. Dramatic dark floorboards provide an aesthetic look and the gas heating and split systems offer year round comfort. Beyond, the 3 bedrooms are serviced by a good sized bathroom complete with spa bath.
Underneath the home youll find good storage space and a workshop with 3 phase power, or a second living area, perfect for the growing family or handyman!
Opportunities like this dont come along very often, so make sure this one is on your must see list!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
PERFECT FROM HEAD TO TOE ON OVER 1100M2
***PLEASE CALL THE AGENT TO BOOK A PRIVATE VIEWING***
Have you been searching for a home with absolutely nothing to do? Then look no further. Renovated to an exacting standard this beautiful home comes ready to enjoy and offers stylish living from front to back. A stunning modern kitchen features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and has an adjoining meals area. The spacious open living area has a cosy wood fire to settle back in front of on cooler evenings and a split system for year round comfort. There are 3 bedrooms including an oversized luxury master that is serviced by a walk in robe and stylishly appointed ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles. The remaining bedrooms benefit from a State of the Art family bathroom. Special features include a fresh modern colour scheme throughout, quality carpets, floating floors, split system to master and designer style. Outside there is plenty to enjoy with a useable and fully fenced 1100m2 allotment that offers established landscaped gardens, a paved covered outdoor entertaining area that is the perfect place to entertain family and friends, double carport and plenty of extra parking. An inspection will delight.

Description:
Your private sanctuary awaits!
**THIS PROPERTY IS CURRENTLY UNDER CONTRACT - NO INSPECTIONS**
Nestled in a quiet but convenient location of Cockatoo, the impressive NANNEELLA PARK is a family home that ticks all the boxes.
Set on a gently sloping 1 & 1/4 acre, the brick veneer residence welcomes with a wide entrance into the formal lounge with wood heater and large windows providing views of the garden. Opposite is a good sized master bedroom with double built in robes, ensuite and outdoor access to a private courtyard, making it perfect for those relaxing weekend mornings.
The appealing galley kitchen with gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher connects to a 2nd living area with split system, and a dedicated dining room which opens onto a spacious undercover entertaining area and provides views of the entire rear yard.
Zoned away from the living areas and serviced by a sizeable bathroom, the remaining 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, all feature hydronic heating that is both cost effective and eco-friendly and ensure the entire family can enjoy comfort throughout the home.
Outside, a large section of the rear yard has been fenced to provide a safe home for pets while the remaining section provides a leafy stroll to Cockatoo creek. The large driveway and double carport affords decent off street parking and gives access to a both a powered work shed and open storage area.
This sanctuary will not last long! - CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Lovely Home On Over Three Quarters Of An Acre!
If you're looking for a home with the privacy of no neighbours, a large block and nothing to do but move in and enjoy then this is the home for you!
The split level home has 3 great sized bedrooms all with built in robes, the Master with walk in robe and ensuite. The open plan kitchen will appeal to the chef in the family with plenty of bench space, gas cooking and dishwasher and integrates with the dining and light and bright family room with cosy wood heater. There is also a second living room which could double as an office.
This great also features gas ducted heating, contemporary tones, lovely polished boards and quality window furnishings. Outside there is a great deck for simply relaxing and listening to the native birdlife sing, or entertaining with friends and family while overlooking surrounding lush bushland. With over 3/4 acre block, there is plenty of room for kids and pets to play all day.
All services connected, dual access, loads of parking, wood shed, garden sheds, lots of under house storage, raised vegie gardens and it backs onto a council maintained lane and Cockatoo Reserve so your assured of peace and privacy.
This is a low maintenance home and inspection won't disappoint!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Living the dream in Cockatoo!
This impeccably styled 4 bedroom split level home sits proudly on a generous 1/3 acre block in a quiet and convenient location of Cockatoo. From the moment you step onto this property you are transported to an exotic paradise.
The home is welcoming and bright with exposed beams and skylights, and provides central heating, gas log fire and a large wood heater to keep you snug in the cooler months, and evaporative cooling and ceiling fans to provide comfort during the summer months. 2 good sized bedrooms, both with robes adjoin the main living area, in addition to the aesthetic and spacious bathroom.
Upstairs, the modern kitchen with large 900mm oven and open meals area become the heart of the home, encouraging conversation and connection throughout. The upper level is comprised of another 2 bedrooms, the master with built in robes, and a second separate toilet. The spaces beyond are currently used as pantry and storage area but could easily be converted into a second bathroom and laundry as plumbing is available in both areas.
Outdoors from the main living area is a stunning covered deck that provides an immediate calm. The resort vibe is continued through the entire garden which is comprised of many different garden rooms, all of which provide their own unique aspect of the property.
Finally, under the deck is a dedicated laundry and workshop, separate to the double carport which fulfills all the requirements for contented living.

Description:
CHARACTER! NEAR LEVEL ¾ ACRE, LANDSCAPED! DOUBLE GARAGE!
Just bring the family and move straight in! Delightful character filled home on a fabulous allotment of 3031 m2 accessed via a sealed driveway and even boasting a double garage.
Lovers of traditional character homes are sure to be impressed by the high, ornate ceilings and cornice, picture rails, French doors and wrap around verandah. The generous living spaces give everyone room to move and the outside covered entertaining area extends that lifestyle to cater for indoors and outdoors. Youll cook up a storm in the well-appointed kitchen with SS appliances and its open plan style, so you can even keep an eye on the children doing homework at the breakfast bar whilst preparing culinary delights. The spacious feel of the home extends to all the bedrooms, all with BIRs, the main bedroom with full ensuite and WIR.
The property also features ducted heating, wood fire, split system, vegie garden and citrus, a studio, water tank and storage shed. As mentioned, the grounds are lovely, back yard cricket or kick to kick is catered for. Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 and Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 are happy to answer any questions and make a time to show you through.
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
Family Home With Style and Space!
This well presented family home on a sealed road is just a short walking distance to Cockatoo township. Its charming facade with character trims welcomes you as you enter through the automatic front gates.
This home offers 3 robed bedrooms, Master with an ensuite and walk in robe, two separate living areas, country style kitchen and family dining area. Modern tones throughout set the style and the timber lined cathedral ceiling and wood fire heater in the main living zone gives a wonderful sense of space and comfort.
Perfectly set up for entertaining, there is a large covered outdoor area complete with a TV with Foxtel and wood fire heater just perfect for enjoying watching sport or movies with friends or family. Or perhaps sit around the purpose built fire pit area and share stories over a refreshing drink.
The yard is fully fenced ensuring kids and pets can play safely.
Further features include gas ducted heating, 2 x split system cooling and a double lock up garage.
Just move in and enjoy this delightful property.

Description:
EQUINE RETREAT WITH FLAT DUAL OCCUPANCY
A sweeping driveway, at the bowl of a private court location, guides you to a beautiful mudbrick farmhouse at the heart of a property that packs a punch. 6 fully equipped horse paddocks just a picturesque 7-minute ride to the arenas and cross country jumps at the Cockatoo Pony Club. Living here can be as energetic or as laid back as you like. Home-laid eggs for breakfast on the deck overlooking the mature orchard after a meditation session or take a relaxing trail ride along the horse trails of nearby Paternoster Road.
The Knox-esque house design uses reclaimed timber and church leadlight windows that add endless character and charm to this spacious home. The dormer window along the centre of the roof ensures light in every room. Each window is a feature in itself even before you look through them. The current set up is as a dual-living with a 2 bedroom fully self-contained flat - lending itself to older parents and equally suited to a twenty-something or two, as a lodgement or a bed and breakfast.
The Main House
The vast blackwood kitchen compliments slate-flooring in the kitchen and meals area. A conventional oven and stove-top alongside an impressive standalone Vulcan wood-fired stove. The kitchen opens into the mudroom/laundry which has space for all of your boots and saddles - the garage, sheds, and yards await you beyond. Back on the other side of the meals area there is a powder room which also serves as a semi-ensuite for bedroom 4.
Rustic balustrades on the spotted gum hardwood floors divide the open plan living. With a wood fire heater at one end and an open fire at the other and french doors in the middle, your all-season comfort is assured. There are 4 bedrooms in this part of the home. 3 have built-in robes and the master enjoys an ensuite and walk-in wardrobe. The light and bright main bathroom delights with its naturalistic stone setting.
The Granny Flat
Entirely self-contained with no steps or stairs and private access through a double leadlight door. It is a charming, private and comfortable space with two bedrooms; one with a large bay window. Both bedrooms have ensuites and walk-in-robes.
Outside for entertaining, you can choose between the back veranda with fire-pit, the spacious north facing front entertaining deck or the bonfire area. The horses have a host of features to enjoy: An all-weather round yard, feed and tack room, hitching rail, large open twin paddock shelter with side hay storage, small closed stable, open stable/hay storage, pony paddock/sickbay, wash bay, water trough and taps in each paddock, 3 gate paddock flow for pasture management, plus a host of other amenities.
Ensure your serenity by visiting this outstanding property.
Insights: 3 Woodrow Court, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
SPACIOUS FAMILY LIVING ON OVER 1 ACRE!
Located on the fringe of Emerald & surrounded by luxury lifestyle properties this beautifully presented family home enjoys sealed road access, rural & bushland views, public transport nearby plus easy access to many great walking trails including Emerald Lake Park & Wright forest. Boasting 5 bedrooms, 4 separate living areas & 3 bathrooms, you can be sure the whole family will love living here! Your comfort & luxury is ensured with high ceilings, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, crackling wood fire plus there is an above ground pool with solar heating ready for another summer of fun to be shared with family & friends. Set on over 1 acre of almost flat land complete with established low maintenance gardens, plenty of lawn areas for the kids & pets to enjoy, heaps of parking space plus there is a huge shed which has concrete floor, power & remote door this property really has it all!!! Perfectly presented & ready to welcome & new family to a wonderful lifestyle, dont miss out on this great location, call us & inspect today!
